text: Bothriospondylus ('excavated vertebrae') is a genus of sauropodomorph dinosaur known from a handful of vertebrae. It lived during the Late Jurassic in England. It belongs to the family Bothriospondylidae that was coined by Richard Lydekker in 1885. The genus is based on the specimen BMNH R44529-5. ==Related pages== *Camarasaurus *Dicraeosaurus *Richard Lydekker Category:Sauropodomorphs
title: Bothriospondylus
